scripts.testdb: npm run expose-db && npm run test && npm run hide-db
scripts.build-container: npm run build && sudo docker-compose build
scripts.deploy: npm run build-container && sudo docker-compose up -d
scripts.dump-db: sudo docker run -it --rm --network=sview_internal postgres pg_dump -h pgdb --inserts -U postgres running > running_db.sql
scripts.restore-db: sudo docker run -i --rm --network=sview_internal postgres psql -h pgdb -d postgres -U postgres -c "DROP DATABASE running;" &&  sudo docker run -i --rm --network=sview_internal postgres psql -h pgdb -d postgres -U postgres -c "CREATE DATABASE running;" && sudo docker run -i --rm --network=sview_internal postgres psql -h pgdb -d running -U postgres < running_db.sql
scripts.dump-temp-db: npm run expose-db && babel-node --presets es2015 scripts/setup_db.js && pg_dump --inserts -U postgres temp_db > temp_db.sql && babel-node --presets es2015 scripts/cleanup_db.js && npm run hide-db
scripts.sql: sudo docker run -it --rm --network=sview_internal postgres psql -h pgdb -U postgres
